page.title: 23Life style
page.content:
The fashion in Havant has changed a lot. Lots people wear jeggins which are leggings that look like jeans. One of the most popular things for girls is flowers in their hair and maxi dress's, this is a dress that goes down to the floor. Boys like to wear sports clothes ,v necks and skinny jeans. Allot of girls go for the world war2 look with the hair bands that they tie in a boe.Proms are a new thing for people who leave school {senior school}. Girls buy new long sparkly gowns and boys buy smart suits. Itâ€™s the best day of their life so far! Some hippies' are still around but rare to see.


Isabelle and George
